name: 12 Week Year Notion Template
description: Plan and achieve your 12 week goals!This Notion planner is designed to help you plan and achieve your 12 week goals. The concept of 12 week goals was popularized by Brian P. Moran in his book, The 12 Week Year. With this weekly system, you can no longer delay or procrastinate on your goals. You will find motivation and urgency in reviewing and executing each week.
